tweet: One thing I love doing is looking for outliers. $XLM is one of them.  While the entire altcoin market went down 90% XLM only went down ~50%. While most other coins trended down it never left its uptrend.  When people buy while the entire market is doing poorly I'm interested.  https://t.co/YR6nrjQXgZ
